title: 2023 University Creative Mobility Competition
description: Hosted by KATRI and KASA. Sponsored by MOLIT.
detailedDescription: Founded Autonomous Driving Club 'S.D.S' and served as Vision Team Leader (Mar. 2022 - Feb. 2024). Led the development of Vision (Camera)-based environment perception algorithms (Object/Lane Detection). Achievements include developing an Object Detection model using YOLOv5 (built a custom dataset of 3,500 images) and designing a Lane Keeping algorithm considering static/dynamic obstacle avoidance.
